title: Instructional Design Workshop for Tablet Integration in Elementary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills, understanding of elementary education environments
context.additional_context: Simulating real constraints in tablet-based lesson design within a virtual environment to explore solutions

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more ecological and technological constraints that arise when introducing tablets.
Learners can design and share a management plan for student work data in a simulation environment.
Learners can create social studies activity scenarios considering constraints using VR-based lesson design tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
